text: aur vah zahar ka sa ghoont peekar rah jaata hai (betee kee) jisakee khushakhabaree dee gaee hai apanee qaum ke logon se chhipa phirata hai (aur sochata hai) ki kya isako zillat uthaake zinda rahane de ya (zinda hee) isako zameen mein gaad de-dekho tum log kis qadar bura ehakaam (hukm) lagaate hain
